name: Khaos Baendicoot
description:
A 3D Hololive Platform fangame featuring Hakos Baelz in her rat form. A game heavily inspired in Crash Bandicoot. Currently in Alpha version. This game has different levels where you have to collect an item to complete them. There are boxes in each of them, and if you break every box in a level you get a secondary item. There's a Time Trial mode where you can try and complete the level in the fastest time possible to get an additional item. 

This current Alpha version has 14 levels. These don't have visual elements (most things are primitive) and their designs probably won't be the final versions.

Readme included (both English and Spanish) with more information about the game, the levels, the boxes and everything else. This game can be played with Keyboard and Joypad.

Credits

- Coding, Scripting, Level Design : Seb_tl

- Models : thatguy, Seafoam, TwiIight_3D

- 2D Art : irasutoya, Kitosdx

- Music : DOVA-SYNDROME, Hololive Productions

- Sounds : https://freesound.org/

- Special thanks : VCentral (and Lau)

Disclaimer

This is a fangame and is not affiliated with Hololive nor does it represent Cover Corp. and other labels under the company. I do not own any ownership of any characters under the Hololive property. Please support the Hololive Talents!
